input.sentences: i went on a road trip last week .
i stopped by a small town .
there were not many people out .
some of the houses were very big .
output.sentences: Today is the day that we start our week long road trip.
This was a picture we took in a small town where we stopped for some snacks.
We almost forgot to get gas, so we got off an exit, and saw a car from the same state as us!
There were't a lot of people at most establishments where we stopped to eat.
However the houses were like mansions, so we imagined that they were all far away of lavish trips.
